requirements.description: You must adhere to a privacy policy that complies with all applicable laws and industry standards.
You must comply with all applicable laws relating to the collection of information from end users of your applications.
You must post a privacy policy clearly and conspicuously within your application, in any store, and on any website where the application may be acquired.
The privacy policy must provide notice of the use of tracking technologies that collect, use, share, and store data, including precise location data, about end users.
The privacy policy must contain a link to Flurry’s Privacy Policy and describe how visitors may learn more about the choices offered in connection with Flurry’s use of User Data.
The privacy policy must include a statement advising users on how to opt-out of targeted ads on a device by device basis and provide active links to opt-out resources.
You must obtain all required end-user consents before using the Services.
You must comply with all applicable laws, policies, and regulations relating to the collection, usage, and sharing of information from users.

type.summary: Compliance with Collection, Usage, and Sharing Regulations
